title: SONGTREE
description: A complete song database backed by the Spotify API.

title: Pinger
description: A tool for accountants that allows them to configure their own ping alerts from QuickBooks Online or Xero.

title: My Bus Home
description: A website for a bus transportation business that transports college students to and from colleges along the east coast.

title: Tapfood
description: A webapp built with React for a food delivery service based in New Jersey. Orders coming in everyday!

title: Phish Player
description: A small app to explore the music of the band Phish and search and play songs. Backed by the phish.in API.
